text: Barry Knapp Bostwick (born February 24, 1945) is an American actor and singer. He is best known as Brad Majors in the musical comedy horror movie The Rocky Horror Picture Show (1975) and Mayor Randall Winston in the sitcom Spin City (1996â€“2002). Bostwick has also done well in musical theater. He won a Tony Award for his role in The Robber Bridegroom. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:comedians from California Category:Actors from California Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:people from San Mateo, California
title: Barry Bostwick
